resources.string:
This Application shows car parking places nearest to your location. 
 
 More information about the parking place like other services offered i.e cleaning services, security level, charges, ans feedback from other users is also given. 
 
 This helps you to identify a favourable parking place for your car, that meets your demands within the least time in the event that you are not familiar with the place.
To view parking places near your location
Shows map of nearest parking places
Manage your Parking spaces, \n Configure map properties to show.
Smart Car Park App needs to get your location, \\nenable GPS and data or wifi
